name: PaymentCardReaderSession.ReadError
desc: Errors that can occur during a card read.

items.name: case cardReadFailed
items.desc: An error occured when reading the card.

items.name: case invalidAmount
items.desc: The request contained an invalid amount.

items.name: case invalidCurrencyCode
items.desc: The request included an invalid currency code.

items.name: case invalidVASMerchants(String?)
items.desc: The specified list of VAS merchants list is invalid.

items.name: case invalidVASRequestParameters(String?)
items.desc: The specified VAS parameters are invalid.

items.name: case nfcDisabled
items.desc: NFC is disabled on the device.

items.name: case noReaderSession
items.desc: No reader session available or the session isn’t ready.

items.name: case passcodeDisabled
items.desc: Read operations aren’t allowed when the device’s passcode is disabled.

items.name: case paymentCardDeclined
items.desc: The payment card declined the transaction.

items.name: case paymentReadFailed
items.desc: An internal failure prevented the read operation.

items.name: case readCancelled
items.desc: The current read operation or reader session was canceled.

items.name: case readFromBackgroundError
items.desc: Read operations aren’t allowed when an app is in the background state.

items.name: case readNotAllowed
items.desc: The read operation isn’t allowed at this time.

items.name: case readNotAllowedDuringCall
items.desc: Read operations aren’t allowed during a phone call.

items.name: case readerServiceConnectionError
items.desc: The session wasn’t able to connect the system UI or other services.

items.name: case readerServiceError
items.desc: A general reader service internal state issue occurred.

items.name: case readerSessionAuthenticationError
items.desc: An authentication error occurred while refreshing reader session.

items.name: case readerSessionBusy
items.desc: The reader is busy with another session.

items.name: case readerSessionExpired
items.desc: The reader session expired and couldn’t refresh due to other state changes.

items.name: case readerSessionNetworkError
items.desc: A network error occurred that prevented a reader session refresh.

items.name: case readerTokenExpired
items.desc: The configuration token for the reader session expired.

items.name: case vasReadFail
items.desc: An error occurred when reading a loyalty pass.

items.name: var errorDescription: String
items.desc: A description of the error in plain text.
